function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Link between increased construction activities and risk of malaria infection","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria infection due to greater need for living space and increased design and construction activities","Mitigation":"Implement measures to control mosquito breeding in construction sites, and promote awareness among construction workers","Technologies":"Mosquito control measures, educational campaigns","People":"Construction workers, residents in construction areas","Owner":"Health authorities, construction companies"},{"Description":"Urbanization as a reinforcing factor on constraints to the use of Insecticide-Treated Nets (ITNs) as an intervention strategy","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness of ITNs due to increased urbanization and greater need for living space","Mitigation":"Promote alternative malaria prevention methods in urban areas, improve access to ITNs, and conduct targeted awareness campaigns in urban settings","Technologies":"Alternative malaria prevention methods, distribution networks, targeted marketing","People":"Urban residents, public health agencies","Owner":"Public health agencies, local governments, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Artificial breeding sites in the built environment as a source factor for malaria transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria transmission due to artificial breeding sites in the built environment","Mitigation":"Identify and eliminate artificial breeding sites, implement mosquito control measures, and conduct regular inspections of potential breeding sites","Technologies":"Mosquito control measures, surveillance technologies","People":"Residents in affected areas, public health agencies","Owner":"Public health agencies, local governments"}]}
